segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, and I can't help but feel worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching to reach those cookies, and the stool looks unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting for a cookie, and she seems so sure he'll get one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I remember doing things like that when I was a kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what's going on behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should warn her, but I don't want to get the kids in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing from the sink is really concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spreading across the floor, and she's just standing there in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's going to slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so calm, it's like a different world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope everything turns out okay, but I'm not sure how.
segments.speaker: PAR
